website_summaries.verdict: Despite some minor issues, it’s a great option for the price.
pros: Solid product that does a consistent job of cooking hard-boiled eggs and omelettes
Users like its performance and aesthetic
cons: Not all users are sold on the accuracy of the timing, as some water levels lead to undercooked eggs
There are complaints about the loud timer

customer_reviews.title: NOT “rust proof” as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product less than a year ago. It began to appear as though it’s rusting. It comes with an insert that claims that it will not rust. I have tried cleaning it with the recommended vinegar solution. I have also tried using a magic eraser. Included is a picture of the product currently, after all efforts to clean it. Tried reaching out to the company’s support staff about my issue and received no reply. Would greatly appreciate some sort of reply from Dash. Product worked great before it rusted. Now my eggs come out with brown spots on them.
customer_reviews.author: Kiley Bugaieski

customer_reviews.title: You have to pierce the bottom of the egg if your are soft-hard "boiling"  Worked well.
customer_reviews.text: This is so cute! Function: You have to pierce the bottom of the egg (the Peirce pin is at the bottom of the water measuring cup with a protected cap. I was afraid I was going to crack the whole egg but did not. Because you pierced the egg, some of the egg whites come out of the top (you place the egg with the piercing hole up). I chose hard-boiled for my first try. Worked great!! perfect HB eggs. It comes with a couple of little trays for poaching and omelet. Aside from being afraid I will crack the egg piercing it - I like this little egg cooker.
customer_reviews.author: D.Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Uneven cooking
customer_reviews.text: I wound up returning this. I wanted to like it, but it just didn't work. My hard boiled eggs were never cooked fully. Soft boiled eggs were always too runny. Poached eggs were never cooked enough. I tried adjusting water levels and could never get it to work right. At the end of the day, it was easier and more accurate to just boil a pot of water.
customer_reviews.author: Nini

customer_reviews.title: Did not last one year
customer_reviews.text: I loved my egg cooker and used it a few times a month. Unfortunately, I purchased this in August of 2017 and as of yesterday the device is broken. It will not turn on and will only buzz when I push the power button. I am disappointed that the item has not lasted even the one year warranty. I have ordered a replacement but I am not confidant on the device longevity
customer_reviews.author: Maureen

customer_reviews.title: Spur of the moment purchase...worked out well.
customer_reviews.text: Received my Dash egg cooker yesterday, good delivery speed. I made hard cooked eggs this afternoon, they turned out well. My husband and my puppy approve. Could not have been easier. Puncture bottom of egg, add water to cooker and push start. I did not think the alarm was especially loud or obnoxious however it was persistent which I needed. BTW: I like these better than eggs cooked in instant pot and clean up is so much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Easy & Time saving.
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite purchase this year. It came yesterday. Today I made an omelet. It looked different but tasted so good. Then I made & peeled 6 hard boiled eggs in less than 30 minutes. They are perfect & taste better than I've had in a long time. I think it's because the eggs are steamed. Clean up was quick & easy, too. I made room in my cupboard for my new star. I'll be using it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Rosebugs

customer_reviews.title: NOT a SCREECHING sound!!
customer_reviews.text: I have no clue what people are talking about with the screeching sound! Mine makes a really awesome morning-friendly jingly tune! I thought my husbands phone was going off. I had literally just said "everyone hates the alarm on this! Just be aware!" Then this lovely little jingle started playing! haha I guess they took some advice from the crowd? Do NOT plug it in before you add water. Made that mistake the first time... or just make sure the button is not pushed when plugging in. After a trial, it made perfectly soft boiled eggs for a yummy low carb breakfast wrap. yum!
customer_reviews.author: Jen Goodwin

customer_reviews.title: Does not cook soft-boiled eggs properly.
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this is cute and easy to use, but the main reason for the purchase was to cook soft-boiled eggs. We Europeans love our soft-boiled eggs in the mornings - especially with bread and butter soldiers! ;) We tried this cooker with a few different amounts of water and times, but the eggs do not come out quite right. The strangest problem is that the yolks cook, but the whites stay runny. That is the exact opposite of how it should be. Unfortunately, I will be returning this. I’m sure it would do hard boiled and poached fine, but we don’t need it for that.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Sooo disappointing...
customer_reviews.text: So.. let me start off by saying this egg cooker is amazing. Perfect eggs every time. BUT I read the reviews about the crazy fire alarm sound sooo I decided to buy this as a joke to my husband. So, we put the eggs in... they get done a few minutes later... and instead, some nice little ringtone plays??? I guess the joke was on me. Lol. They must have changed the sound after the complaints. But honestly we are going to use this all the time, super freaking delicious eggs.
customer_reviews.author: NDollarhyde

customer_reviews.title: Greatest Gadget
customer_reviews.text: I had been making hardboiled eggs in my InstantPot but it is rather cumbersome. It works great but again, cumbersome. I have several Dash products and wanted to try this one. Oh my gosh, this is a game changer! I will definitely be taking this little guy on trips with me too. Small footprint, easy to use, so quick and the eggs come out perfect every time. Just follow the instructions and you will be amazed! Set ot and forget it. So glad I got this!
customer_reviews.author: Karen W

customer_reviews.title: Not as annoying as advertised
customer_reviews.text: It works fine. The alarm is not nearly as annoying as other reviews led me to believe. While it was a little loud, it was an alarm clock style jingle. No screeching, honking, or ringing. Anyway be careful taking the top off, burned my hand the very first time, don't be too eager to check out your eggs... Update: this thing makes hard boiled eggs perfect every time. So easy to peel too. Generally I don't like appliances that only do one thing, but if you like easy to make, easy to peel, perfect every time time hard boiled eggs, you want this.
customer_reviews.author: Ivy and Claire's Mom

customer_reviews.title: I am impressed!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This little gadget is amazing! It is literally the easiest way to make hard-boiled eggs. They come out perfect; the instructions are spot-on. The more water you pour in = the more 'well done' they are. It's also fun to poke the hole in the egg with the tool. Easy to wipe out (while it's still warm) the bit of hard water that occasionally builds up. It's also small enough to toss in a cupboard or even a drawer. I totally recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: GmaKraken

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing!
customer_reviews.text: I love love hard boiled eggs. They are tasty and a very quick and easy breakfast. And this little thing sure makes is so much easier to make them. Just put my 6 eggs in, turn it on, and walk away until I hear the cute little song play. And they are done. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: R. Brand

customer_reviews.title: Worked great- once.
customer_reviews.text: I was so friggin excited to get this after reading all the reviews and seeing it on Buzzfeed and every thing- I’m on a diet and have been eating boiled eggs for breakfast while working from home. I thought this way, I wouldn’t have to worry about my eggs boiling over on the stove while I worked! I used it ONE. TIME. The eggs were great! However, it quit working after that!! I am soooooo disappointed and will be returning this.
customer_reviews.author: Nicki Ashley

customer_reviews.title: I will never boil another egg.
customer_reviews.text: I'm really just shocked at how simple this device is to operate. It came with a small measuring cup that tells how much water, based on soft or hard boiled and the cup also has a puncturing tool on the bottom to punch a small hole in the large end of the egg. After that, you put the eggs in the holder, small end down, install the lid, push the button, and walk away. It makes a pleasant chiming sound when your eggs are ready. I cant say enough about how impressed I am with this simple device and how happy I am with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Rich Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I was anxiously awaiting my rapid egg cooker because I love eggs and hate that you have to watch and wait while they cook. This product is absolutely amazing. I immediately tried cooking soft boiled eggs, followed by poached eggs. They were so incredibly easy to make and were delicious. Perfectly cooked. I would highly recommend this to anyone that like to take the easy road when it comes to cooking eggs!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Trisler

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for one person or a small family.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and takes up little space. May have to adjust the water to get eggs cooked the way you like. Large eggs are better suited to the directions. My husband likes larger eggs so I add a bit more water and they cook longer. Easy poached eggs and easiest clean up for eggs like this. This is also true for hard/soft boiled eggs. Just don't forget to spray the dish for the poached eggs. Perfect for small apartments. More expensive egg cookers can't do a better job.
customer_reviews.author: Frances Ruoff

customer_reviews.title: This is so much faster and easier than regular cooking!
customer_reviews.text: I decided to try this out since it’s made by Dash and their products work very well for me in the past (their mini waffle maker is also great!). I was still a little skeptical since there were some bad reviews. I am glad I bought this because it works! I love eggs but cooking them and cleanup can be annoying. I made easy, quick, delicious poached eggs this morning. The cleanup was fast and easier than cleaning up a pan. I can’t wait to make omelettes next! I already told my sister to get this. This is so much faster and easier! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle G

customer_reviews.title: It does not Poach Eggs
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed in this product and if it wasn't for the fantastic reviews and advertisement of being the Best, I would have never ordered this because I already have 2 egg cookers and they both work. I purchased this product due to the accessories that came with it and my favorite way to enjoy eggs is poached. This product is so small it looks like a Toy and when I tried poaching eggs they were practically raw. I did not try boiling eggs because I only use Jumbo size and I do not believe they will even fit. I think the Great Reviews must have been given the product free!
customer_reviews.author: Texaswinner

customer_reviews.title: Egg-Celent Appliance
customer_reviews.text: I am a fan of this egg cooker! I saw it being used and needed to have it in my life. I have used it to make just about every type of egg it can cook. My favorite to do is a personal sized omelet. So perfect! Follow the instructions as they come with the cooker and your egg life will never be the same. The clean-up is hassle free and it takes up little to no space on your counter. I wish I had this when I was in college because it is legit a necessity for dorm living!
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Herman

customer_reviews.title: Buzzer is a buzzkill
customer_reviews.text: This seems like a great egg cooker. It does everything it needs to do, but we often cook eggs while getting ready in the morning and aren't always around to monitor the process. This egg cooker emits the most annoying buzzer that reminded us of the emergency broadcast system buzzer they used to play on tv or radio in case of a natural disaster. The sounds does not turn off by itself and was so loud it made my three year old cry. We had to return it. Other than that, seems to work fine.
customer_reviews.author: john street

customer_reviews.title: Green on the outside, undercooked in the center.
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews and this seemed like a great item to own. I purchased a half dozen of my favorite eggs (organic, humane-certified, and bright orange yolks). Followed the directions and ended up with yolks that were green on the outside, the classic sign of overcooked eggs, and yet still undercooked in the center. I’m guessing many reviewers don’t mind over and under cooked eggs. The only redeeming quality was the very fresh eggs were easy to peel. There is not a timer so playing around with different levels of water and ruining more eggs is not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: LKA

customer_reviews.title: You can hear the pleasant chime when eggs are done.
customer_reviews.text: I originally ordered the Maxi Matic egg cooker and it did a nice job cooking the eggs, however, the buzzer that let you know when the eggs were ready could barely be heard and it was just a hum and I have good hearing. I thought it was malfunctioning so I ordered a replacement but unfortunately the buzzer could not be heard on the second item either. I decided to order this Dash egg cooker because it had the same features as the Maxi Matic. It does a great job cooking eggs and when the eggs are ready you HEAR a pleasant chime that lets you know they are done. I am very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect eggs in just a few min!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little gadget. Saves me tons of time and cleaning. I can cook poached eggs, scrambled or hard/soft boiled in it in just a few minutes and they come out perfect. It comes with a little water measuring cup pre-marked with the amount required for each type of cooked egg. When it’s finished cooking the eggs it plays a little song. It’s super easy to use. I use this little thing every morning now! One of my favorite amazon buys.
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little egg cooker. It’s so fast and easy. Peeling the eggs is no problem at all. This one makes six but if you don’t put the middle piece on the tray you can cook seven. Clean up is a breeze. The alarm at the end of the cooking cycle plays a nice little tune. Super cute, easy, and a better way to constantly get great results with your eggs. Make sure to read the directions though because it does make a difference in regards to which side you puncture the egg. When you puncture the wrong side they don’t peel as well.
customer_reviews.author: Allie

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it. Best investment ever!
customer_reviews.text: Love that this is so quick and takes away the hassle of boiling eggs and draining them and having to clean multiple utensils/appliances. I make hard boiled eggs every other day for my breakfast. This is definitely worth the buy when meal prepping the day before or even eating same day. I also love poached eggs. I wouldn't really consider making an omelet in this, only because it would be so small and I'm not sure if it would fit much more ingredients in the omelet cup. Pro Tip: If you want more soft or medium poached/boiled eggs, don't overfill the water line and make sure you take the eggs out as soon as the music (timer/alarm) starts playing.
customer_reviews.author: SusieNY

customer_reviews.title: It worked!
customer_reviews.text: I'm actually pretty shocked that this cute little appliance worked, but it did! Pros: It works! Easy assembly Clear instructions Easy to clean 98% of the eggs (we cooked a dozen to start) peeled clean Cooked to perfection Quicker than expected Chime that lets you know its done Color - I bought the teal Cons: Couple eggs bubbled out the top holes, but not a deal breaker Feels cheaply made - but it works and will never be on display
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer  M.

customer_reviews.title: Must buy!
customer_reviews.text: There are many kitchen gadets on the market. I feel this one is so slick, easy to use, and small- doesn't take up much of any space in the cupboards. I do leave the eggs under the cap for 2 minutes after the timer bell goes off as I feel it needs a little more time to cook. The shell comes off great. The eggs taste great! So much easier than boiling the eggs.
customer_reviews.author: Katie P

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for but this one is worth it
customer_reviews.text: I gave it 4 stars because as you can see from the picture, after one use, that’s what it looked like. I can imagine this won’t last long but for the price it’s worth it. The second picture shows what it looks like when I boiled it at the hardest setting. Didn’t come out exactly how I expected but it was still very delicious. For the price, it’s worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Aviles

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little egg cooker!
customer_reviews.text: They must have read the reviews about the timer sound, because now it is a nice, pleasant musical chime. I bought this to make omelettes, and it works great. After reading some answers to questions, I decided to go ahead and just fill the water cup up to the Hard Boil line, for the extra time. It cooks a perfect, fluffy omelette in a little over 8 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Rubybear

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Every Time!
customer_reviews.text: This cooker was a great find! I used to boil my eggs, but after a kitchen renovation left us with no stove, I took a chance on this. I’ve only used it for hard-cooked eggs. There’s a small metal point at the bottom of the measuring cup. It neatly and easily pierces the bottom of the egg. Add water according to how you want the eggs cooked, and when the process is done the unit chimes. Eggs peel easily. This is one of the most convenient products I have purchased in a long time!
customer_reviews.author: M.M. DeSoto

customer_reviews.title: UPDATED "DONE" SOUND
customer_reviews.text: First thing first. I just got my second one of these after I lost the cup thing that comes with it. The first model made amazing amazing eggs. Perfect every single time. The caveat was the HORRID noise it made when it was done. Like a fire alarm mixed with a young child screaming. It truly was awful. This second model, much to my surprise, plays a nice melodic song when it is done. I was so happy to not be audiologically assaulted when my eggs just finished, so I wanted to come and write a review regarding the new update that makes this egg cooker a 5/5.
customer_reviews.author: Jim D.

customer_reviews.title: Only good for boiling eggs. Disregard the promise of omelette or poached eggs.
customer_reviews.text: Great cooker for boiled eggs, but horrible for poaching and omelette. Been playing with the water proportion, time cooking but impossible to get poached eggs. They are either over cooked or if using the timer and measures in the instructions it’s barely cooked except for the outside.
customer_reviews.author: POjeda

customer_reviews.title: Too Easy!
customer_reviews.text: Ok. So here I am. I am the type of person to buy a gadget and try to justify spending the money on it later. I bought this little egg cooker hoping it would work as advertised. Let me tell you something. It does! It's really simple! And the eggs peel easier than if I had put them in a pot to do it. I usually make hard boiled eggs so can't comment on the medium or soft boiled versions. I got carried away with how well this thing worked I made 72 hard boiled eggs. Egg salad sandwich anyone? Happy!
customer_reviews.author: Viking

customer_reviews.title: Use the correct size of eggs
customer_reviews.text: A lot of people have had issues with this not making certain types of eggs, which I initially found true. However, after switching to smaller eggs, the issues for poached and omelettes has resolved. Personally, I just make soft boiled eggs, and they're perfect! My trick is grab some tongs and immediately grab the eggs when the buzzer dings and place them into a bowl of cold water, otherwise they will continue to cook. Its pretty fool-proof, honestly. Also, I use a kitchen timer, not the machine.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: My new beat friend
customer_reviews.text: I could not love this more. Works great once you play with the water level. More water the longer it cooks. My first poached egg using their water level came out as egg soup. The next time I did water to just under the hard line and I got perfectly cooked drippy eggs. I use this daily.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Hall Deaign

customer_reviews.title: waste of eggs and money
customer_reviews.text: this thing is messy, I bought it specially to involve my kids in breakfast preparation, the eggs never came right, they drip all over the little hole, the base gets SO dirty, soft eggs are SO HARD to peel that we end up throwing most of it. I prefer using my instantpot since it makes peeling a breeze. I wish I could return it but I don’t have the box anymore. I’m so disappointed, specially in this times when you work harder for your money. DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY
customer_reviews.author: KerRbn

customer_reviews.title: All you do is press the button
customer_reviews.text: Really amazed how easy this is to use. There's a water cup with a little pinpoint on the bottom that you poke a hole in the bottom of the egg, then put them in the container, fill it with water with the water cup you just had in your hand, and press the button. That's it. Clean up is just wiping off the plate with a wet paper towel and the eggs are perfect each time.
customer_reviews.author: Slanted

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy and handy to use. The water level and desired "boiled-ness" are something you kind of have to work out, but that's no big deal. The alarm song for when it's done is obnoxious, but if you're nearby, you can easily and quickly shut it off, no big deal. I love it because it makes it fast and easy for me to get boiled eggs, so I've been more likely to eat eggs like I want to. Overall, I would recommend, just have realistic expectations about the small drawbacks of it. I would still purchase it again though!
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: I love this little thing...
customer_reviews.text: I don't buy appliances for the kitchen. I especially don't buy ones that only do one thing. But this little egg cooker is so wonderful, I will never boil again. Easiest hard boiled eggs EVER. And after a few eggsperiments, I figured out my perfect poached egg formula. This machine is worth it for that alone. I was even looking forward to the hideous siren everyone warns you about but instead got a nice ting-a-ling-a-ling sound like a ringtone. And it's loud enough that you hear it. This thing gets pride of place in my kitchen and I love it. Did I mention I love it?
customer_reviews.author: Heather Light

customer_reviews.title: Impressed!!
customer_reviews.text: Totally impressed! I always seem to overcook mine, and this little gadget looked super easy and fast... so I thought I'd try it. I prepared it for "hard" boiled. It says it takes about 12 minutes. It was done in 10 but I let it sit for another couple of minutes. They were absolutely perfect!
customer_reviews.author: L.E.W.

customer_reviews.title: Peeling Hardboiled Eggs is a Breeze with this cooker
customer_reviews.text: I really like this egg cooker! The main benefit for me was the easy peel of the eggs. I eat hard-boiled eggs for breakfast and my frustration came with peeling them. Other than that I don't notice much of a benefit over regular boiling. If easy peeling comes with having ANOTHER appliance I say it is worth it for me. If you have no trouble in the peeling department but are just curious, I wouldn't bother. The taste and the consistency are the same. The 4 stars is because the alarm is DREADFUL!
customer_reviews.author: JPRchitect

customer_reviews.title: Does not last long
customer_reviews.text: This item started to malfunction (i.e., the alarm did not go and the auto shut off) within 6 months of purchase. More troubling, if you push the button to turn the device off, it will remain on (heated). This egg cooker worked well for about 2 months of daily use, since then it has not worked properly and it is a fire hazard.
customer_reviews.author: saltynatoballs

customer_reviews.title: Great Egg Cooker!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely Love this little egg cooker. So very easy to use & clean. We made poached eggs on toast & the eggs as you see came out perfect. We also did hard boiled eggs for egg salad and the eggs were cooked perfectly. This item is great for a small family of 3 or 2 people. I just wish they would make a bigger/larger one that would hold a dozen eggs. Great product and I Highly recommend it!!! Watch for more pictures and video soon.
customer_reviews.author: JoAnn DeAngelo Roman

customer_reviews.title: A-M-A-Z-I-N-G!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this! I wasn't a big egg eater but when I started doing Keto, I had to incorporate eggs into some of my meals. I have never been able to cook an egg correctly where it's cooked thoroughly. With this, I pierce the eggs, put them inside, set it and forget it! The machine will let me know when the eggs are done. Best kitchen gadget I've ever purchased!
customer_reviews.author: Chryspy13

customer_reviews.title: this didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: I tried this 4 times, and I had problems every time. I tried eggs boiled soft, medium, and hard. The soft and medium eggs both had raw egg white around the yolk that was slimy and gross. The hard boiled eggs had fully cooked whites, but the yolk was runny in the middle. I tried the poached option, and again the whites were raw and gross around the yolk. I read the directions carefully, and I believe I followed the directions correctly. This product just did not work for me at all.
customer_reviews.author: Lee D.

customer_reviews.title: Easiest & best way to cook eggs
customer_reviews.text: I love this little gadget! Easy to use, practically no cleaning needed and the eggs come out perfect and easy to peel. The sound it makes when the eggs are done sounds like wind chimes, loud enough to hear from another room, but not ear piercing by any means. I like eggs very hard boiled (no trace of anything gooey in the middle), so i just add a little extra water (fill the little measuring cup to the top) which makes them cook longer, plus i let them sit a couple of extra minutes beyond that.
customer_reviews.author: 9sapphires

customer_reviews.title: That noise?!!?
customer_reviews.text: Look, I admit that I bought this after seeing it featured on buzzfeed. It was cheap, and i love eating coddled/soft boiled eggs. I figured that if it sucked, no one had to know. This has now become one of my favorite appliances (for now). I have eaten way too many eggs lately, but I don't regret anything. It makes my eggs perfect, it's super easy and by the time my coffee if done, I have breakfast. I do admit that I haven't used the poacher or omelet makers, maybe one day (probably not). Oh, also... The alarm sound is strange and incredibly loud. If there was a way to disable it... I would love to know how!
customer_reviews.author: ShanniBannani

customer_reviews.title: Poached, Hard and soft boiled, omlets, in a jiffy. Perfectly cooked every time..no guess work!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my! Love love love the egg cooker. Even comes with measuring cup for perfect timing for egg. Auto shut off when eggs are done..and quick too! I highly recommend this product...I’d like to buy for all my family members! note..make sure you are using large eggs. I used XL egg and used the measured amount of water for large egg.. only time it did not turn out perfect. Thus was USER ERROR, Super easy to adjust for all sizes of eggs, just check the directions!
customer_reviews.author: Caribouwoman

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: This seems to be one of those products that one ask " how did I live without it" . The eggs cook perfect and peeling is now VERY easy. I'm not sure if its the steam or making the small hole (easy to do) in the top of the egg, but I've never been able to rely on being able to peel the eggs so perfect.
customer_reviews.author: TS

customer_reviews.title: Eggs will never be the same
customer_reviews.text: I am absolutely in love with this thing! It is super easy to use, cooks the eggs perfectly, is easy to clean and is pretty quick with the cook times. I am a huge fan of poached eggs and this thing does poached like a champ. I usually ruin any hard boiled egg I touch but with this thing I could hard boil eggs all day every day. It is what I’ve been missing my entire life.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: Color and the item looks cute. But item didn’t work well for me for making scrambled eggs or an omelette. I mainly purchased to make hard boiled eggs and the puncture it requires you to put on egg shells causes a big mess and the yolk boils and seems through the shell causing more of a clean up then intended. I think I’ll stick to making hard boiled eggs the old fashion way. It was a nice concept just didn’t work for me.
customer_reviews.author: CRS

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I loooove my egg cooker. I use it several times a week. It's small so easy storage and cleans easily as well. I prefer my eggs to be more done, so I do fill the water container more than what is recommended and they always come out perfect. So happy I bough this!
customer_reviews.author: Cara McDowell

customer_reviews.title: Egg cooker
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping you would ask. I love it. I just make hard boiled eggs with it but it doesn't require salt or anything to make the shells pretty much just slide off the eggs when peeling😃. No need to set a timer because the machine plays a pretty tune when eggs are finished, so no guess work or cleanup involved. Just put required amount of water in tray, put hole in shell, place eggs in gizmo, put on cover and push the on button. Wait about 15 minutes and viola! done. I really am happy I bought this little fella😍. Thank you ever so much for making life easier.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra L. Hahn

customer_reviews.title: Most perfect eggs every. Single. Time.
customer_reviews.text: I literally have made deviled eggs three times since I got this machine. My boyfriend eats a ton of eggs and (since he doesn’t cook) told me the other day he never realized how much trouble making hard boiled eggs was before we got this machine. So many people marvel about it, we have gotten three friends to get one! The omelette is a bit small for him, but perfect for me! And I love the poached ability, eggs Benedict is a favorite around here. 10 minutes, perfect eggs every time.
customer_reviews.author: JediJessi31

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT HAVE A LOUD BUZZER - awesome addition to the kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Buyers, look at the date of the reviews. I have purchased 3 of these (one for myself,, one for my mother & one for my dad). They ALL play a musical chime when it is done cooking. Loud enough to go into the next room and not miss it but is is by no means a "banshee" or "fire alarm". I LOVE this cooker! I got one for myself and loved it so much, I bought one for my mom, and another for my dad. Both of them love theirs as well. Truly makes perfect hard boiled eggs!
customer_reviews.author: catsma

customer_reviews.title: perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to update my old egg cooker. I bought one for myself and one to give to MIL. They came packaged well and were delivered very quickly. I've already used mine & the eggs were delicious. Super easy to use, very cute in my kitchen, and I was so pleasantly surprised by the "chime".. I love singing appliances :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful! Perfect eggs and lovely noise!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this egg cooker and my kids love to help me cook eggs now. I read about some kind of shrieking noise as it alerts, but mine has a lovely little tune that I was pleasantly surprised with and almost makes you want to strut or jig over to your eggs 😂 (I purchased the aqua, not sure if color makes a difference). So wonderful, lovely time saver, perfectly cooked eggs, comes with recipes and it is so super cute!
customer_reviews.author: Linjpow

customer_reviews.title: Great small kitchen appliance
customer_reviews.text: I bought this so I could make perfectly cooked SOFT-boiled eggs....this one does it (but I did add water to the "medium" line because I hate undercooked gooey stuff). This did the trick. Also does hard-boiled in about 10 minutes....the peels don't stick! I havejust started trying poached, but haven't been too successful yet (but soft-boiled are so similar that I probably won't use that dish). Omelettes are perfectly cooked and can be served in cute little circles! BEST kitchen appliance I've purchased in many years (and I hate to buy ones that are never used).
customer_reviews.author: retired teacher

customer_reviews.title: The kitchen appliance that was missing from my life!!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t believe I didn’t know about this egg cooker until recently. My son loves eggs slices. I enjoy eggs Benedict and frequently make deviled eggs or potato salad with HB eggs. This device is a game changer. Perfectly cooked. Easy to peel. I have used this every day since purchasing. It’s extremely easy to clean. You will have zero regrets. This is something you can travel with or bring to the office .
customer_reviews.author: Skibumohio

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something that would let me cook boiled eggs quickly without constant monitoring and water changes and such. This fit the bill. It cooks 6 eggs in under 20 minutes that are easy to peel and perfectly done Every Time. For the price, you can't beat it. And, when we had a Superbowl party and I was designated deviled egg maker, this worked perfectly. I wouldn't trade it for anything and definitely is one of my favorite "appliances that replace other appliances" . It's right up there with my crock pots, sandwich maker and electric griddle.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Alarm sound is pleasant now!
customer_reviews.text: What a wonderful little gadget! Eggs came out perfectly and peeled so much easier than boiling them. I’m more of a sit it and forget it type person than a watch the pot boil and set a timer kind of person. They cooked for 10 minutes and were wonderful. When I ordered it, I saw so many reviews and videos that the timer alert sounded like a fire alarm. There must be a newer version because mine was a pleasant little song! It’s not letting me attach a video but I promise it’s not like the older reviews anymore so stop debating and get it!
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Changed my life
customer_reviews.text: So this is the 3rd rapid egg cooker I've purchased. I give them as gifts and would straight up break some bodies knee caps if they tried to steal mine. My family of four's hard boiled egg consumption is concerningly high since buying this but until a cholesterol test on my 5 year old puts an end to our fun we are riding this dream as far as it takes us. Also be warned if you buy 3 of these Amazon starts suggesting you buy every egg product ever created but honestly it is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Anna from MN

customer_reviews.title: BEST EGGS
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I enjoy soft and hard boiled eggs and they never come out perfect in the pot. This gadget is very small about the size of a cereal bowl which is great for storage, you poke holes on the bottom of your eggs pour the amount of water associated with how cooked you want your eggs and wait until the water is gone it then makes an alarm like noise to tell you they are done. So far I have only made hard boiled eggs with this but man are they good! No sulfur smell in my house or greenish over cooked yolks no more! Wonderful gadget, life changing!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Whhat is up with this?
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this egg cooker -- easy to use -- easy to clean and makes hard boiled eggs perfectly and the shells are so easy to peel. However, my cooker keeps getting a burned/brownish residue in the same area every time I use it. It smells burnt. It does clean right off using a Mr. Clean Magic Eraser. But I am stumped as to what this is and why it is happening. Anyone have this same problem?
customer_reviews.author: Karma Kottage

customer_reviews.title: Love this little guy!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this little guy for a month now and I’ve used it almost every day! My favorite thing to make with it is an easy omelette (more recently with egg whites and spinach), and as long as you remember to spray the little plate before adding the egg it’s super easy to clean up. Also, I was expecting some horrible screeching noise when my eggs finished up(because of the reviews I’ve seen), but mine came with a pleasant little sound, almost like a jingle. I still turn it off right away, but it’s not terrible! Also, the color is beautiful (I have the light blue/sea foam looking one) and it’s easy to store in my cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: MUSIC when the cooking cycle completes!!
customer_reviews.text: Love mine at home so bought one for our RV. We nicknamed the one at home “the banshee” because of the screech when it’s over. Imagine my surprise to hear MUSIC when this one finishes the cycle!! MUSIC! Watch the quick video I made to hear. (I just ordered a second one in the same color so hopefully it will play music, too. Time to retire the banshee!)
customer_reviews.author: C. Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Amazing little cooker
customer_reviews.text: I have one of these for my house that I got for Christmas, and love it so much I talked my work into getting one too. Everyone loves it and 3 people at work are getting one for themselves now. The eggs are perfect everytime, and easy to peel, too
customer_reviews.author: Oceanbaby

customer_reviews.title: Great Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: For easy peel boiled eggs (has been a life struggle mastering this) I will be forever thankful for this product. Just poke a hole in the eggs with a given tool, throw some water in there, twist the cap on and leave it. Product does the rest. Timer is a bit obnoxious but I just unplug it once I hear it. The extra tray for scrambled and poached eggs is a great bonus for a single girl like me- less pans, less mess, less dishes! and SIMPLE!
customer_reviews.author: Channelalexis

customer_reviews.title: I got a skeptic to believe!
customer_reviews.text: A coworker recommended this product and I put off buying it for so long! Wish I would have bought this sooner. My husband was a skeptic and thought I was just buying another kitchen trinket. The day we got it, we tried it out and we ended up making 18 hard boiled eggs for his lunches for the week. He couldn't believe how fast they cooked, how easy they were to peel and how well they turned out! I highly recommend this product to anyone who likes eggs!
customer_reviews.author: Morgan C

customer_reviews.title: Like cooking with a Tamagotchi—-sooo darn cute
customer_reviews.text: Adorable, cute and small. Perfect for anyone with limited space and perfect for anyone who wants eggs perfectly done. I hate to cook, but I actually had a blast playing with this. I worried that piercing the egg would cause it to leak but that’s not the case, This thing has egg-celent instructions too, all appliance makers should take note of how Dash does this. Was up and running quickly and very clear. I wish I liked eggs more because this thing is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: SnowbirdTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: I'm impressed
customer_reviews.text: I was a skeptic, but this is a wonderful product! I love hard boiled eggs, especially in salad. I have been cooking them the traditional way for almost 30 years. My husband bought this for me as a gift, and I am incredibly pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Jaymey

customer_reviews.title: This little thing is awesome. It makes perfect hardboiled eggs
customer_reviews.text: This little thing is awesome. It makes perfect hardboiled eggs. I haven't had any issues peeling hardboiled eggs made with this. I'm giving it 4 stars because there's a bit of a learning curve with the other egg dishes. I haven't been able to figure out poached eggs yet, even when following the directions exactly. So you might have to do some experimenting before you find out exactly how much water you need to get your eggs the way you want them. No matter though, it's still way easier than using a whole pot just for two poached eggs.
customer_reviews.author: Cait O

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Was given as a gift for my Mother. She loves the color and the ease of use. Our only complaint is that this egg cooker does not only not seem to turn itself off automatically upon completion of cooking. Oh, and be warned, the chime that the device makes when the eggs are cooked is very loud and harsh- similar to a fire alarm. The sound is almost somewhat amusing to me though because of how off-putting it can be.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Time Saving
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this device. Just put the eggs and water in the container, plug it up, turn it on and don't worry about it till you hear the music ring. No more having to boil water or time the eggs. I add a little more water in container since I like the yolks of the eggs a little more done than just filling it with water to the hard boil mark. Easiest way to boil eggs !!!
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie Tankersley

customer_reviews.title: hard boil eggs - and a new improvement
customer_reviews.text: This is the easiest way to quickly prepare hard boiled eggs for breakfast. No saucepans, no need to watch the water - just quick prep and walk away. My husband uses this kitchen tool once a week, and we have purchased others for gifts. The only downside was the loud noise the gadget emitted to tell you the eggs were done cooking, which would send our young g'children scattering - sounded like a smoke detector going off. BUT we recently bought another for our second home; it appears they have now changed that timer noise to a lovely musical chime. Highly recommend for every kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Great gadget!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing, and the new chime that plays is way better than the old buzzer that would startle you when the timer went off. I use this a lot, and the really great thing is that my kids can use it too
customer_reviews.author: M.B.N.

customer_reviews.title: Great for hard boiled eggs only!
customer_reviews.text: Making hard boiled eggs has just gotten so much easier! I use to forget about the eggs constantly and the buzzer on this thing is VERY loud! Takes about 15 minutes and peeling the eggs is easier as well for some reason. (I put in ice water as soon as they are done) I attempted to make an "omelette" in the omelette maker but when it was done the eggs were still really watery. I had to finish in a pan and they smelled and kind of tasted like plastic. I will only be using for hard boiled eggs moving forward!
customer_reviews.author: HLT

customer_reviews.title: Small and versatile
customer_reviews.text: First I wanted to just buy an egg poacher and then I came across this cute little thing. It is amazing! I can get ready in the morning without having to run back and forth having to keep an eye on the stove. It comes with everything you need from an alarm when the eggs are ready based on your desired consistency and a needle on the bottom of the measuring cup to poke your eggs for easier peeling. I've no idea how long I was able to live without this because I use it every day 😀
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Fool proof hard boiled eggs
customer_reviews.text: I’ve purchased several Dash appliances - mostly because I love the aqua color and they don’t take up much room. The ice cream maker is a dud, the mandoline is 5 stars!, the pie maker and waffle maker are ok. This egg cooker is pretty much fool proof. Use the correct amount of water, puncture egg and close lid and turn on. The omelet maker is pretty useless, and I haven’t tried poaching. For the price, this is a cool item.
customer_reviews.author: Jloep

customer_reviews.title: They changed the “done” sound to a nice chiming!
customer_reviews.text: Okay- my gf and I were wildly entertained by the reviews saying that this thing made horrible screeching demon sounds- BUT I believe they must have changed that feature because now it makes a very gentle melodic chiming sound when it’s done!!
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Very neat product and functional.
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic egg cooker. We purchased this unit for the kids ages 9 and 12. Boiled eggs makes a healthy breakfast, and no boiling water means no mishaps or potential injuries. This cooker meets all my expectations. Out of the box, we steamed 6 eggs to a hard boil, and they came out absolutely perfect. Use common sense when handling the eggs, as they will be scalding hot. We went over some safety issues with the kids and we feel comfortable letting them get up in the mornings to cook their own eggs.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Dalton

customer_reviews.title: Don't know why I didn't....
customer_reviews.text: ...get one of these sooner! Don't care how differently I hard boil eggs, I end up throwing half the egg out due to stupid sticking shells >_< I was going to buy one of those eggsters or whatever they're called, then came across this little beauty. Have made several hard boiled eggs for different recipes & not once did my eggs stick to the shell. My deviled eggs look gr8 now! The little guide also gives you a few ideas on different preps. Have had scrambled eggs, super moist & easy clean up. Takes up very little room on the shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: It really works!
customer_reviews.text: Upon my brother-in-law’s recommendation, I bought this for my husband to use...and, he really does use it! And, let’s just say that he is NOT a king in the kitchen! If you read and follow the instructions, it does everything that it was designed to do. I just wish that I had ordered it in a color to match my decor...I got it in aqua so I could easily find it tucked back in one of my cabinets with the rest of my “hardly ever used” collection! Oh no, this one never leaves the counter top!
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: So adorable and makes perfect eggs
customer_reviews.text: I love this little thing! Easy to clean and makes perfect little eggs every time. The color is so cute too. It shouldn't be hard to make hard boiled eggs the good ole fashioned way but it is for me lol. So might as well use this adorable little egg cooker that makes the cutest little dinging noise when the eggs are done. I love having hard boiled eggs ready in the fridge as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole S.

customer_reviews.title: BEST KITCHEN APPLIANCE EVER!!
customer_reviews.text: Hands down, the best kitchen item ever!! This was so much smaller than I expected so it doesn't use a lot of counter space. You premeasure the water in a provided cup, poke a hole in the egg (so much easier to do than it sounds), turn it on, and in 12 minutes you have perfectly cooked eggs. It even times for you but they recommend 1 extra minute for more cooked eggs and I agree. Once done, I drop them in ice water for a bit and they peel so easily. They are cooked perfect every time! I love making and peeling eggs now! So fast and the cooker is really quite cute!
customer_reviews.author: Amberly

customer_reviews.title: Love it 😍
customer_reviews.text: Used it for first time today...loved it! Easy to use perfectly cooked hard boiled egg. Great for those of us with adhd and never sit still long enough to prevent burning everything. Only thing I noticed was you need to dump water and clean the second you get youre gas out or it will burn the water out fast causing browning go heating plate.
customer_reviews.author: Datblondenurse

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Simple to use. Note that the built timer is just a warning tone and does not measure the exact time, use a kitchen timer (most stoves have one these days) according to the instructions. I then put the whole tray with the eggs still in it in the fridge for about half hour, and the eggs peeled perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Ward

customer_reviews.title: Life Changer
customer_reviews.text: This egg cooker has seriously changed my life. It's so easy for me to make a healthy snack or some eggs to put in a salad for lunch. There is hardly any eggy smell when using the Dash. It's super easy to operate, even my boyfriend who doesn't know salt from sugar figured out how to use it. Some people are complaining about the piercing alarm noise it makes, and while yes, they are right it is very loud, it definitely shouldn't be a deal breaker. I actually find it funny now when it doesn't scare me half to death.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: May need to adjust
customer_reviews.text: The egg cooker was easy to align and get ready for cooking. But, what I discovered, to my dismay, was that the cooking times did not work for my high altitude home. My first poached egg was all but raw after the water-timed amount I did according to directions. I've discovered that I have to have an "experimental" egg by adding increased amounts of water to increase cooking times. It's been a rather slow process of getting things right, and I'm still working on it. I suggest the manufacturer include high altitude directions.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn K. Leach

customer_reviews.title: Very easy and consistent
customer_reviews.text: Got this to make soft boiled eggs. It is so easy!! I had to run a few test runs to figure out what water level was best for my preferred done-ness but now I get perfect soft boiled eggs every time! I haven’t tried the omelette or poached and honestly I probably never will. I love the cute jingle it plays when your eggs are ready.
customer_reviews.author: Carley

customer_reviews.title: Nice Egg Cooker
customer_reviews.text: When I took it out of the box, I was amazed that it is so little. I read the instructions before using it. The eggs cooked just like I had expected. When I would boil the eggs the old fashioned way they never came out right. Other reviews said that the timer was so loud and obnoxious, but what I heard was a nice tinkling sound. Don't hesitate to buy one.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: I have yet to make hard boiled eggs where the yolks are actually completely done. I filled to the correct line, and keep experimenting by adding more water to get them to cook longer because I'm trying to get use out of this machine, but to no avail there have been issues every time. The yolks are never completely done. I've had eggs crack in there and another time the egg bubbled up thru the pin hole you put in them. It is a very handy machine to set and forget, but I feel it was a waste of my money when a simple pot works every time.
customer_reviews.author: Sparlika

customer_reviews.title: Does a great job
customer_reviews.text: I have a friend that kept telling me to get one of these and I resisted for a long time because I have too many gadgets and I figured it was easy enough to cook eggs in a pot ... but no. I was wrong. This egg cooker is great. It is easier than cooking in a pot, there is less to clean up, the eggs are MUCH easier to peel... and it is small so it really doesn't take too much space in my cabinet. I am not sure how I lived without it for all these years
customer_reviews.author: OMEvans

customer_reviews.title: Must have for hard boiled egg eaters
customer_reviews.text: Saw this on one of those "must have" lists and couldnt be happier. I was not able to consistently cook hard boiled eggs with easy peeling and this is the PERFECT SOLUTION. Cooks them perfectly every time and so easy to peel. Its tiny too so it barely takes up counter space. The song at the end is obnoxious but you certainly wont forget to unplug it.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: great egg cooker
customer_reviews.text: I so love this little gadget. I put my eggs in with a little water- it comes with a measuring cup to use depends on how you want your eggs cooked from soft to hard, pour that water amount inside the cooker, put top on push button and it sings a cute little song when its done. so fast and easy. will never boil eggs again.
customer_reviews.author: doublediamon

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for boiled eggs
customer_reviews.text: The most amazing products for boiled eggs. No guessing if they are done and I’m not sure how but the system they use make them so easy to peel. My husband thought it was a joke. What sold him was how easily they peel as oppose to demolishing the egg after boiling. This makes cooking and peeling amazing! Especially for the price. If you don’t like it you only lost $20. But you will not be disappointed. May take a couple of time to get it all down the way you want it. But when you do....WOW!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley M Cross

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I made poached eggs, and they turned out great. I added extra time as they initially came out a little undercooked. I just left the lid on so it could continue to steam. This didn’t scream at me when it went off. It played a pleasant little melody. I’m honestly disappointed because I wanted to see what the screaming alarm was all about.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Cunnington

customer_reviews.title: Plays song when done
customer_reviews.text: Best invention ever! I almost didnt buy because of the screeching noise in other reviews but they must have fixed that mine plays a song. Perfectly cooked eggs so fast!

customer_reviews.title: What you need to know!
customer_reviews.text: This is wonderful. I love using it. Cooks them great. I add just a little more water to it as i like cooked a tiny bit longer. When the water is gone it will souls an alarm for you to shut off. The ice water idea is great and makes it a breeze to take off the shell. The only problem is I wish I would have bought the bigger one. The one that cooks 12 at a time. My four boys eat these too fast! I have not cooked eggs another way yet. Poached, scrambled etc.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl B.

product_meta.title: Dash Rapid Egg Cooker: 6 Egg Capacity Electric Egg Cooker for Hard Boiled Eggs, Poached Eggs, Scrambled Eggs, or Omelets with Auto Shut Off Feature - Aqua
product_meta.description: Color:AquaHealthy living starts today with the Dash Rapid Egg Cooker! How do you like your eggs? Imagine being able to prepare a dozen deviled eggs in under 10 minutes! You can cook hard, medium or soft boil 6 eggs at a time, poach, scramble or make fresh customized omelettes. Perfect eggs, your way, every time. Unprocess your food today with the recipe book that is included with purchase, and gain access to our database of thousands of recipes for free!
feature_bullets: SATISFACTION GUARANTEED: Dash Rapid Egg Cooker is the ORIGINAL (and most trusted) egg cooker on the market, for perfect eggs, your way, EVERY TIME, we guarantee it!
SIX EGG CAPACITY: Cook up to 6 eggs in soft, medium, or hard boiled firmness, while saving time and water. Eggs come out consistently perfect, shell is easy to peel, and clean up is super easy!

QUICK + EASY: Short on time? Simply choose your preferred eggs and set the timer. The auto-shut off function prevents overcooking, and the buzzer will alert you when your eggs are ready. Its so simple, even your kids can use it. Power: 360 Watts. Material Plastic, Metal

VERSATILE: This is the PERFECT appliance for picky eaters, large families, or those who have busy schedules. Hard boiled eggs, soft boiled eggs, poached eggs, scrambled eggs, individual omelets, and all within minutes of the push start button - it couldn’t be easier!

COMPACT + LIGHTWEIGHT: Weighing 1lb, the Dash Rapid Egg Cooker is your MUST-HAVE for that first apartment, smaller kitchen, college dorm, or camper/RV traveling. Plus, its sleek design and trendy color options will accent any kitchen space (bonus all included accessories fit inside, taking up even LESS space). Boils up to 6 eggs at a time, poaches up to 2 eggs with its separate poaching tray or makes an omelet. Cord length: 33"

INCLUDES: Dash Rapid Egg Cooker is backed by a 1-year manufacturer warranty and includes a poaching tray, omelet tray, 6 egg holder tray, measuring cup, recipe book and recipe database access (all non-electric parts are dishwasher safe).

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars6,000 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
